website_summaries.verdict: The LG Watch Urbane is the best-looking Android Wear smartwatch and adds Wi-Fi-to-phone connectivity, but it doesn't offer all that much more than previous Android Wear watch models.
pros: Wi-Fi antenna connects to phone across different Wi-Fi networks
cons: Big design won't appeal to many wrists
Android Wear software still doesn't feel all that smooth to use
watch is expensive compared to other Android Wear options

customer_reviews.title: Best Android Wear device yet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent battery life, brilliant screen, beautiful design, this is so far the best Android Wear device I've ever seen and owned. While I wish the charger was wireless, it's not too difficult to get it seated correctly in the dark since it does use magnets. They get away with a full circle by not including an ambient light sensor but I've not found that to be any problem. This watch lasts me almost two full days on a single charge with regular use. My other devices usually barely made a single day. Also, I've had people compliment it then realize it's a smart watch because the screen is so crisp and vibrant it looks like a real watch.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bernhardt

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy anything from this seller. Bought this watch and received the update almost a year later. Update broke my watch. Sent it back to LG Repair and they told me that they do not support this product. Due to it being either an international product or a knock-off. Email from LG: Good afternoon, Please be advised that we are returning your LG Watch Urbane as is because it's a non-US manufactured model. Please get in touch with the seller and advised them of our findings. We don't repair international model. Thanks, Jay MC Supervisor LG Electronics Alabama, Inc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking watch!
customer_reviews.text: While I already had the original G Watch, this round Urbane watch is much nicer looking, more like a typical watch, but with the added twist of it being a smartwatch. Yes it is a little more bulky, but after a short while I did not find it uncomfortable. This adds WiFi (which the original G Watch does not support), but I did not yet notice that it synced any differently by using Bluetooth alone. The display is bright in most indoor locations but like any display of this type, it can be difficult to read outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: -=Rudy=-Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: The aesthetics are very nice. In the smart watch category
customer_reviews.text: The aesthetics are very nice. In the smart watch category, this is the most elegant of "them all". I know its limitations compare against the new models so it will be an unfair comparison since this, although I bought it "like new", is a 2015 model. So be it as it may, the processor (or software; it's not 2.0) can get very slow thus "laggy". I recommend not to load it up with many apps; just get the basics. Battery-wise I end up with 39 to 51% at the end the day. UPDATE: I end up returning the Item.
customer_reviews.author: EOS

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely satisfied with this watch. The faces are extremely customizable. The fit tracker seems very accurate. I have gone four days without charging it and it got down to 14%. It doesn't make any sound but the vibration gets your attention. It keeps me aware of how much activity I do or don't do and drives me to do more. The fit feature will calculate your average distance traveled, steps taken, calories, time of activities. I just try to do more than average every day. So it slowly becomes a habit. It looks great too. The leather band that it comes with is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Trader Vyx

customer_reviews.title: Very nice look and function ,better glass (3d corning)
customer_reviews.text: I own the older LG r , Since I have another phone so I need another watch to go with,a dress up one, then the best part is the watchmaker app ,combine u get to design and put in Any watch faces u want .Compare to the older no corni0ng 3glass face ,this one has a little more 3d look so your created faces look much real.Adding shadow on hands making movement looks real. U can design and make face like a swiss watch maker ! no problem with smart basic function ,wish has phone talk ability. Now u can add more gold face to go with this dress watch .
customer_reviews.author: jshum

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality screen and extremly poor warranty service.
customer_reviews.text: Watch worked fine for a few months, developed several red spots in the lower left corner of the screen as the OLED begins to fail, searcing online showed this is not an unheard of problem with this watch but that LG will "fix it". Sent my watch in, they send it back an entire month later and still have the red spots on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: BrianS

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it's functionality and endless capabilities to change up my ...
customer_reviews.text: I get LOTS of compliments on this watch!!! I absolutely love it's functionality and endless capabilities to change up my watch faces. All owners be sure to go to Google play and install "Minimal and Elegance" app. You can install custom watch faces from the Google+ Community, twerk them (change color, fonts, etc) or create your own, to include personal photo backgrounds! The possibilities are endless! And I ordered a rose gold band also for dressy days! Best smart watch I've purchased hands down.
customer_reviews.author: DixiePeach

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: My Moto360 1st generation battery quit working and I began looking for a replacement watch. Loved the look of this watch along with the price. I have a smaller size wrist and while the watch is big it isn’t so large as to be an annoyance. I get a lot of compliments on the watch’s style and can’t complain about it’s functionality.
customer_reviews.author: R Fisher

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for watch and 2 stars for Battery = 3 stars overall
customer_reviews.text: Watch pairs easily with my Android devices (Nexus 5 / Galaxy S6) and the quality and functionality are high. Can be customized to one's heart's content. But the battery - while bigger than most on the market - did not last a full day (let alone the 2 as advertised). I kept the watch face off - <1 day; I kept in on - but low light and < 1 day. So, if you dont mind charging and bring a proprietary cradle with you to do so...then this is a good product. I do not have the Apple "i" equivalent so cant compare battery life...but at < 1 day, this was a return item for me
customer_reviews.author: AGoodfriend

customer_reviews.title: Finally found my smart watch
customer_reviews.text: I waited and read a ton of reviews and kept this in my wish list for months. Totally worth it. *Battery life: I get over a thousand notifications a day. Battery lasts all day but not multiple days. Being a power user of all my devices this works for me. *Easy to exclude apps from notifications. Despite other reviews you can exclude birthdays from the calendar. *Solitare on the watch is addictive. *Notification latency Depending on the network I'm on sometimes I'm on a call when the watch tells me they're calling. *Meeting notifications are awesome! Syncs well with touchdown and I've been much more timely in getting to meetings.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Barker

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: This product was used which was not stated in the description of the product. It not have English version of the start guide. Orderd the pink gold not the silver. Need to be discounted
customer_reviews.author: JMClark

customer_reviews.title: It looks really nice compared to most and has good battery life
customer_reviews.text: It looks really nice compared to most and has good battery life. I've had a few syncing issues where it couldn't identify my phone was there, but mostly it has worked flawlessly. I wouldn't say there's a "Killer App" yet that makes a watch a must have, but it is often way more convenient than pulling out, unlocking and using the phone. It was definitely weird having a watch on again, and remembering that I didn't need to check my cell phone to find the time...
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch, brah.
customer_reviews.text: After doing research between the Moto 360 and the LG Urbane, I landed on this one and I gotta say, I couldn't be happier. The snapdragon processor is quick, making all touch gestures responsive and sharp. Love the maps, Hangouts, and especially the Spotify integration. Also, I was expecting the leather strap to be pretty blah, but no, it is some really high quality leather. Very soft. Side note: Download the Watchmaker app and join the Google+ group. There are some seriously talented watchface designers on there.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Boyer

customer_reviews.title: This watch looked so cool. However I could never get it to pair ...
customer_reviews.text: This watch looked so cool. However I could never get it to pair with my LG G3 and it didn't let me do much of anything. Returned it. Too bad because it looked awesome.
customer_reviews.author: jubilee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work, difficult to attempt
customer_reviews.text: it works but its buggy. It can be frustrating to find your activity records because the user interface changes the navigation in unexpected ways. The nicer watch faces also interfere with the ability to read activities. It does record activity and gets messages from your phone but its just not as easy to use as it should be. Update after 9 months the device generates random step counts and is completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Steve300

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have had the moto 360 for about 4 months now and I loved it. I did research on other smart watches that had come out and debated whether to get the pebble steel or this watch. Although the battery life on the pebble was nice, the look was not what I was looking for. When I got this watch I immediately knew this was the one. The battery life is great, the display is great. I have no complaints so far about this watch. I am definitely recommending this watch to my friends and family
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Dermody

customer_reviews.title: An amazing watch with great performance and decent battery life.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this watch. It feels "just right" and has a amazing display resolution. I've tried several ones and ended up finally choosing this one. The battery life nets me almost 2 days worth of usage and the customization options for bands and faces a extensive. I would recommend this watch for anyone looking for a good Android Wear device. NOTE: I did return the watch but only because I got the same one for a slightly better deal due to some gift cards I received. Amazon had the best price without the gift cards.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Pace

customer_reviews.title: Great smartwatch.
customer_reviews.text: Great smartwatch. After charging, setup took all of 3 minutes. Screens are very intuitive. I have large wrists, so this fits me perfectly. Leather band is a bit stiff at first, but is getting more pliable with time. Hopefully, they will come out with more options for the band. The color of the watch is not exactly the same as stainless steel. I've looked at several watch / jewelry shops with no luck. I ordered one from Amazon based on the seller's assurance (and a few reviews) that it was for the LG Watch Urbane and I just sent it back, it's not the same shade of silver.
customer_reviews.author: Ab Nin

customer_reviews.title: Very good and useful watch.
customer_reviews.text: Very useful watch. It pairs easily with Android phone, can customize watch faces. Get notice of emails, messages, maps, fitness, many other apps from the watch -- no need to pull the phone out of your pocket. I wore this watch in the ocean with no noticeable affects Battery life is very good for me, all day even with a watch face always on. Slightly bulky, but that's an "in" look for me. I tried another watch first and switched to this one!
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL MCGREW

customer_reviews.title: Ive had thewatch for a week
customer_reviews.text: Ive had the watch for a week. I've had other smart watches and this is by far the best of them all. In fact there is no comparison. Pairing with Bluetooth is a little tricky if you don't read the instructions. Battery life isn't quite as good as stated in some of the reviews, Where they claimed 2 days. I find that it needs charging every night.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looks and device
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a "like new" return from Amazon and saved $50 off the normal price. As for the watch, I really like it! I got this for myself as a Christmas gift because half the time my phone beeps, its a game or email I don't need. Now I can just check my wrist and not chance dropping my phone. Almost two days battery life (WiFi off) and does exactly what I want!
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: ... a Moto 360 1st generation this is a far better watch my only complaint it looses wi fi easily ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a Moto 360 1st generation this is a far better watch my only complaint it looses wi fi easily if you buy this watch use the watch maker app to download other faces I found these faces do not drain the batery
customer_reviews.author: Frank Mohr

customer_reviews.title: It is a greatwatch for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have spent a long time to find a smartwatch that I would want. I finally broke down and purchased this one. It is a great watch for the price. It does all that I wanted it to do. I'm even happy with the battery life. I can wear it all day with my busy schedule while checking status and updates to my calendar it only uses about 60% of the battery. That is when I have the screen turned off when I'm not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Arner

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. Very functional and user friendly. I am a small framed female and am very happy with this purchase. I have a Samsung note 4 and considered the Samsung watch but after some research decided on this lg and am very pleased with my decision for many reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good function, but Looks, meh.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned the 360, the LG R, and now this. This is byfar the best of the androids. That being said, the look, even though it is nice, is really like a stainless Timex. My Engineer Stainless band dresses it up big time, but frankly, the watch drags down the aesthetics of the band. Don't expect too much. If you want function, go with the LG R since it will get WiFi soon.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kwak

customer_reviews.title: ... people ask me about my watch because it looks like a watch
customer_reviews.text: Many people ask me about my watch because it looks like a watch, and yet has a clear bright LCD screen. Doesn't make you stand out like you are trying to hard. Only recommended if you have an Android based phone. I ran into issued syncing it with the iPhone app. It syncs and if the connection is ever broken, has to be completed reset to sync again. These problems don't happen on android.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Stitt

customer_reviews.title: but this is not just awatch. She is thrilled with it
customer_reviews.text: My wife has a lot of watches, but this is not just a watch. She is thrilled with it. I had an older original LG G watch, I bought this one for her, then after Christmas I bought myself a silver Urbane.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Smart Watch in the Market
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Android smartwatch in the market at the moment. You can use it on Android and IOS. The only thing except Iwatch is answering and talking calls from watch. I think i will never want to talk someone about my private in a public area with a smartwatch. So, LG G Watch Urbane is the best smartwatch you can buy for now. It has everything you may want.
customer_reviews.author: Can Berk O.

customer_reviews.title: Best smart watch on the market
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from an Lg G Watch R, great watch all around, the looks are equal to or more than it costs, and the functionality is similar to the R, i would only recommend someone to step up from the R only if its black looks didn't match their style, otherwise the wifi on the Urbane is hit and miss and doesn't always connect when away from my phone's Bluetooth range - perhaps future sw upset will fix this.
customer_reviews.author: lynx80

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied even after a year of use
customer_reviews.text: Nice and practical smartwatch. I've replaced the original band with a metal one which nicely pairs with the watch. LG might be doing something wrong about the marketing. Even after a year after purchase, people are still surprised these are actually a smartwatch and keep asking what brand it is. I like the always one feature that does not eat much battery and also the fact that the watch charges very quickly and with with no problem the battery lasts over whole day.
customer_reviews.author: Hausie

customer_reviews.title: Has been super useful and stylish purchase
customer_reviews.text: Has been super useful and stylish purchase. I constantly get people striking up conversation asking about my LG Urbane and expressing how much they like how it looks. Took me a long time to pick out the right Smart Watch for myself and I think I made the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Beauty and Function all in one
customer_reviews.text: This a beautiful watch. I have been asked what brand it is multiple times by people thinking it's just a watch and not even realizing it's a smart watch. It connected easily and quickly and had all the normal Android Wear features you would expect. I did not realize that it doesn't have a speaker at all, so no notification or alarm sounds from it just a vibration. The Wi-Fi connectivity is nice but is somewhat limited and doesn't seem to reliably connect without being specifically told to. Overall though I would definitely recommend this watch for anyone who wants a very nice looking time piece as well as a smart watch.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, functional and practical
customer_reviews.text: Simply one of my best purchases ever; Its an awesome smartwatch with excellent battery life; looks is incredible with a golden mesh strap; its awlways a conversation opener in every restaurant or house party. Everyone asking the price of such piece of tech always goes up to ten times its real price. (expensive look) Gorgeous, functional and practical would be the 3 main adjectives I'd put on this excellent piece of tech
customer_reviews.author: Octavio Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch. It is worn almost daily and have had no problems with battery and function. Has had more comments on it's look and how it works well with my phone. Would definitely recommend to others. Thanks LG
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Bruh
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and elegant. The battery life is questionable because I don't use it everyday, but it charges up pretty fast. Should last you an entire day (24 hours) if you don't use the flashlight option.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great watch without the tech look, but still turns heads!
customer_reviews.text: Great smartwatch! I've had the watch for 6 months and wear it everyday. I give it a 4 stars because within the first month or so, the screen turned black and would not come back on. Luckily I played around with it before sending it to LG support to fix. I turned it off for a while and then placed it on the charger. Other than that, no issues. If you like to have a smartwatch that doesn't totally look like a tech product, this is great!
customer_reviews.author: Charonn Latrice

customer_reviews.title: Seems to update and then it resets all my saved ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to update and then it resets all my saved information. Also occasionally has issue with the wrist gestures not accuratly reading. Aside from that it works perfectly most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: ShaliquinnsSchematics

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a smartwatch that feels like a watch.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic smartwatch. I have tried many kinds, Galaxy Gear, Sony Smart 2, G Watch R, etc. The Urbane is without a doubt the strongest of the set. Software is all Android and all good. Android Wear plungs in well with other apps such as Fit, Android Sleep, etc. Urbane also looks fantastic, the first Smartwatch I have seen that looks like a watch. That is difficult to find with other smartwatch products. 5/5 would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Adams

customer_reviews.title: seems like screen was not okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought the international version and returned it after 2 days, the watch had a dot on the left botton, seems like screen was not okay, with iPhone Android smart watch sucks, But still I got Fossil marshal which is way far better than this watch, You'll have to unpair after every restart or update and wifi connection doesn't work, you'll always have to work with LTE. Either go for second edition or choose something which atleast looks good. Go for Silver version of LG Urbane which looks quite professional.
customer_reviews.author: Mohit

customer_reviews.title: meaning it doesn't look like a computer on my wrist
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing and using this watch for a few weeks now and I'm loving it. It has a classic watch look, meaning it doesn't look like a computer on my wrist. The screen looks amazing and I find it very responsive when swiping away notifications and opening menu's. Now for the small down side of this watch, the heart rate monitor. I have used it for several workouts and have found that it's not even close to accurate. If your buying this watch because of the heart rate monitor I would say keep looking but if you want a great looking smart watch then this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Jared M Stargel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch. Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Son as he requested it. I told him it's be a Christmas gift but he's getting it early. Great watch. Make sure and get all of the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Dena.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this watch.  Many problems, poor customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Multiple problems with watch. Returned it once and now having more problems. Terrible customer service, could not get any help. I submitted warranty information but when I had a problem with the watch, they said they couldn't access the information and I needed to "PROVE" that I bought t
customer_reviews.author: Timothy S Sever

customer_reviews.title: I have been getting nothing but great reviews as people don't even know it is an ...
customer_reviews.text: This watch is off the chain. I have been getting nothing but great reviews as people don't even know it is an electronic watch till I tell them. The only thing that would make it better is if it would allow you to speak into it when making phone calls.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: awesome piece of technology good with text voice recognition the ...
customer_reviews.text: awesome piece of technology good with text voice recognition the look and feel is great the wrist strap has been very good to me charge lasts longer than a day. A lot more useful and helpful than I would've thought
customer_reviews.author: Jose Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Nice little gadget
customer_reviews.text: Great product by LG. Syncs perfectly with my LG G4 and (now) G6 phone. Still working very well after 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Nwonknu

customer_reviews.title: I've really enjoyed text notifications and other types of notifications
customer_reviews.text: I've worn my LG Urbane for several days now. I've really enjoyed text notifications and other types of notifications. Google Now has been more useful than I thought it was. Battery life has been adequate; lasting well over a full day of use. (I would love for it to be several days, but at least it's been well over a full day) I'm quite happy with this watch and hope Google continues to improve Google Wear.
customer_reviews.author: David Boucha

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife for Christmas. She loves it. My son has the exact same one. He bought it for himself after exhaustive research and that is why I bought it. There is no sound, but it shows everything that the phone screen does.
customer_reviews.author: Mark, Port Charlotte, FL

customer_reviews.title: I like that fact that it is a watch
customer_reviews.text: I like that fact that it is a watch, that's why I'm giving it 2 stars however that's about it. The watch doesn't stay connected to the phone Long and the notification don't come through. So your constantly going to have to pull out your phone to see who's calling or texting.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: What a great smart watch
customer_reviews.text: What a great smart watch!! I had been researching these for months and decided my first smart watch should be the LG Urbane. Boy, was I right. Got it on 6/15 and had comments from viewers right away. Looks great, works like a charm, and lasts all day (battery). I charge my Samsung S4 every night so no issues putting the charging station right next to my phone. Next watch should be an upgrade, like a speaker, better phone connectivity, etc. In short, I'll be wearing this for a long time, if for no other reason than it looks great!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay R. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch, good battery life considering
customer_reviews.text: Better battery life, I like the always on feature. It really gives off the impressions that it's not a smart watch. The battery life is better than other smart watches, At the end of practically a full day of use there's 48 % battery remaining. I have received tons of compliments on it, when people realize it's not just a normal analog watch, and learn it's an android wearable watch.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Crisafulli

customer_reviews.title: Classic Design
customer_reviews.text: It is a simple classic design that goes well with most outfits. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JCO

customer_reviews.title: Good looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Good looking watch... Still lacks, but think it's more of an Android wear issue... Needs speaker so you can make calls from it and it can sound notifications
customer_reviews.author: Justin L. McCracken

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed that I have to deal with LG direct as ...
customer_reviews.text: Dead pixels 1 week after Amazons return deadline.... Wish their exchange/replacement program would run a little past the 30day policy It was a birthday gift, very disappointed that I have to deal with LG direct as the process will take much longer just to exchange...
customer_reviews.author: Elida

customer_reviews.title: Me likey - thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: For a first gen device, this really works well IMO. Does what I need it to do: texts, Google Now, very, very useful reminders for business and personal stuff, even full email and Reddit. Looks very nice too. It kind of changed my life within a day. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Rocko

customer_reviews.title: Great Smart Watch!
customer_reviews.text: Everything is as advertised. I use it with my Samsung Note 4 and the watch actually has better speech recognition than my phone. All in all this is a great smart watch, very reliable, and easy to use. All the cool apps can be used.
customer_reviews.author: PS4 User

customer_reviews.title: Love the watch
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch. I get many compliments on the design. I wish it had 4g lite and I wish I was able to use phone features without my phone. I lose connection within walking a about 50 feet if not less.
customer_reviews.author: Toya

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking Watch
customer_reviews.text: I was shopping for a new watch anyway so I decided to try a smart watch. This has been working really well for me. I am a bit of a gadget geek and this fits the bill. I get many complements at work and from friends on the look of the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Munnz

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and would definitely recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Great buy and would definitely recommend to anyone. It's up to google to work on improving the OS in adroid wear so we can continue to enjoy this project.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Best android wear in 2015
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant watch. Has 5.1 out of the box. Band looks great. The rose gold watch looks amazing. Battery lasts 36 hours per charge.
customer_reviews.author: Ameya

customer_reviews.title: Works well with iphone 6
customer_reviews.text: my favorite new watch. It synchronizes with my iphone 6, so I can leave the phone on my desk, and use other rooms in my office, knowing that I can see who is calling or texting any time.
customer_reviews.author: credenhill

customer_reviews.title: I'm a techy, it's tech, it works and ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a techy, it's tech, it works and its usefull. I get Complements alot along with the band I chose from YouPiffa seller on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: It is definitely the best looking smart watch out there
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Father's day gift for my dad he absolutely loves it. He isn't the most tech savvy person but he hasn't had much difficulty getting used to it. It is definitely the best looking smart watch out there. Battery life makes it through the day fine and the charging cradle is nice
customer_reviews.author: erica

customer_reviews.title: Looks like an alanog watch but it's a digital computer.
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels great. I am still learning all the features it offers.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C. Ruble

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant! The best smartwatch a have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant! The best smartwatch a have ever used! Premium design, the lastest os update, all day on screen, 2 days of work after one charge, much more better than moto 360 and pebble
customer_reviews.author: Roman Zharko

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived when it said it would, even a few hours earlier. Great quality, the case it came in was really nice, I love the WiFi and how I'm able to see my calories, my steps, my avg etc. Google speak so I can send a text with out taking my phone out of my pocket really handy while driving. tons of different watches faces so you can customize it to your liking. Highly recommended for the person who wants an upscale look to their smart watch.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Not too happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Not too happy with it. Bulky and huge. I wasn't happy with the color of the gold either, looks way to cheap. Overall the watch looked cheap. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria2112

customer_reviews.title: Third gen is best with heart rate monitor
customer_reviews.text: Third generation LG smart watch. Love this version because of heart rate monitor. Does everything first and second but faster and with heart rate monitor helps with using fit apps.
customer_reviews.author: Danilo Bohanan

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch for my Husband's birthday. First when he saw the box he was like OH LG MAKES WATCHES NOW!!! Then he realized OMG THIS IS A FREAKING SMARTWATCH!!! His face lit up and the watch looked like a regular watch. He has a movado that he wears almost daily, hopefully now the lg watch will its place and beat it in every way. Amazing technology and recommended for every tech person. works great and synced with phone in less than 15 min.
customer_reviews.author: Khushi Sheth

customer_reviews.title: The price is the same as Apple, the customer service is not
customer_reviews.text: I loved the watch until an update bricked it. At that point I shipped in the nonfunctional watch to LG and I've been waiting for a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Kesler

customer_reviews.title: Nice Watch
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Took a little trial and error to patch it to the mobile phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ken C

customer_reviews.title: Beats the Moto 360
customer_reviews.text: In both style and functionality/battery it beats the moto 360 I was using. I also got it for $120 off retail thanks to Fast Electronics. For that discount others had defects listed in description, it came in box and no defects. Couldn't speak more highly of them
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Not much different from a smart phone, but it's a new gadget that keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband since he had been drooling over it and too gun shy to purchase. He LOVES it. Not much different from a smart phone, but it's a new gadget that keeps him from looking at his phone so much, so it's a win-win here.
customer_reviews.author: mathness

customer_reviews.title: LG Urbane is the Best
customer_reviews.text: By far the best Android watch I've found. I've had several including Sony SW2, Samsung, Qualcomm, and LG Watch. The pulse monitor works great. Screen is easy to see even in daylight.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Fillmore

customer_reviews.title: My dad can use it so can you
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch form my Dad and he loves it was easy for him to set up (he is 71 year old) it seems to last 1.5 days before he has to recharge the battery
customer_reviews.author: Skinny

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much, I bought one for my son. And it was a great price on Amazon warehouse deals. Best Buy is to much.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Degeorge

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm diggin this watch! I'm sure over time there will be more function as android wear matures. It helps remind me to get off my butt and move!!
customer_reviews.author: Dabber

customer_reviews.title: Great watch!
customer_reviews.text: I took my time and researched my options for a smartwatch, and even after I made my selection, I wasn't sure. All of my concerns disappeared when I opened it up. Very attractive, works great, syncs up flawlessly to my Samsung Galaxy Note 5 and does everything I expected it to do. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: The boyfriend LOVED it. Works like a dream. Perfect condition. Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.author: May Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my watch, the only downside is that it only uses hangouts for messaging on Android phones
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Wessels

customer_reviews.title: Great watch.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. The weight is good, the size is good (for a 6' male), and the screen is crisp. I also have the LG G Watch R. They are a nice compliment to each other - the Urbane is a bit more dressy, and the R is a bit more sporty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: On the bulky side. Ended up exchanging for a Huawei.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Ketcham

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, for a first time smart watch buyer
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, for a first time smart watch buyer, I love the fact that it almost looks like a regular watch, and people don't recognize it until I start using my fingers to go through the cards. Screen resolution is good, but I could never get my watch to last more than 8 hrs with ambient mode on, may be it is because of the watch face I choose...
customer_reviews.author: Dinesh Y

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my Husband for his birthday. He ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Husband for his birthday. He absolutely loves it and has no complaints. We've had it since July 2015.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: the best there is
customer_reviews.text: way better then the moto 360... there just isnt any reason to bother with the competition. superb smart watch
customer_reviews.author: Nauman Jaliawala

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful AND functional!
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful piece of equipment. Took only half an hour to setup all the options once I got it charged. Looking forward to showing it off at work tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: dingodave

customer_reviews.title: Didn't meet my expectations
customer_reviews.text: No, I was greatly disappointed by size, slow boot time, features. I decided to gave it to my son as I'm personally not going to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great watch with great features! Works with both iPhone and Android. Of course, it has more functionality on Android, but it works fine with iOS. I recommend this over other smart watches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with everything it does. Does what it says it will and does it well.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it. Took a few days to get used ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Took a few days to get used of all the settings and how to use it. I have 18 other very expensive watches. Cannot remember the last time i wore any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Max

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like this android watch. get positive comments on it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Framyr M. A.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing this for over 6 months and I love it. At least once a week I have someone complimenting me on it. I can't even count how many demonstrations of the watch I've given.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking, works well, good battery, few apps
customer_reviews.text: The watch works well, it is fast and very intuitive. Wish there were more apps like instagram and snapchat. Also more watch faces. But the performance and the batty is very good for me. Sometimes the watch turns off the wifi and it says to save battery even when my watch and my Samsung S5 have 80% or more.
customer_reviews.author: David Segovia

customer_reviews.title: LG LOVES LG
customer_reviews.text: LG Watch for a friend, to match his LG Phone. Loves It!
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Watch great, does all expected. Many different faces to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sister's birthday and she loves every bit of it!
customer_reviews.author: Ray Weller

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch. Its not as big as people make ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch. Its not as big as people make it out to be. Overall its smaller than my friends moto 360 or at least it seems that way to me. I used to have the lg g watch and this is so much nicer than that plastic junk. Already ordered a new steel band but I don't mind the leather one that lg provided
customer_reviews.author: Jason Surage

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great smart watch ! Wish it could make calls and wish the watch face was bigger
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Warren

customer_reviews.title: This this is great. Owned the Silver Urbane and lost it
customer_reviews.text: This this is great. Owned the Silver Urbane and lost it... Bought this one and I like it even better. Pair it with the Grapestec 22mm Steel Stainless Metal Watchband and you'll have a beautiful rose gold watch that is extremely stylish. I get compliments on it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jack C

customer_reviews.title: Great smart watch.
customer_reviews.text: Really great looking smart watch. Good quality too. I wish they had more software for android wear though.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. V

product_meta.title: LG Watch Urbane Wearable Smart Watch - Pink Gold
product_meta.description: A smartwatch shouldn't look like you have a computer strapped to your wrist. It should act and feel like a watch first. It should be elegant on the outside while housing some of the most advanced technology on the inside. LG Watch is a truly premium smartwatch that unifies fine craftsmanship and breakthrough innovation. Tradition and style evolved for 21st century needs.
feature_bullets: 1.3" Full Circle P-OLED Display with Gorilla Glass 3 and Full Metal Body with Screw-Less Back Cover
Fitness Integration with Built-In Continuous Heart Rate Monitor and syncs with sensors and applications for real time health and fitness data
Environmental Biosensors - detects and tracks Barometric Pressure, Gyroscopic Movements, Accelerometer, Geomagnetic Sensor, PPG Heart Rate Monitor
Music Streaming - stream music stored in the internal memory to a compatible Bluetooth device.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars627 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: OS-Android Wear, Display - 1.3” Full Circle P-OLED, Processor - Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ 400, 1.2GHz, Bluetooth® - 4.1 LE, Wi-Fi® - Yes
